name: Unyielding Delusion of the Far-North Scions
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  The grand city of gold and white stone was no more. Following the moonlight'spale guidance, its exiled inhabitants wandered to a desolate foreign land.  The glory and prowess of the past had dried up like morning dew, yet theearliest delusion still flowed beneath the skin of the proud, unlike thegraves now lost to time.  Like farmers breeding their crops, the Archpriestesses who served themoonlight, for generation after generation, selected the purest bloodlinesclosest to their progenitors, no matter the cost…
